query.mssql: create table {0} ([recordId] int identity(1,1), [DocID] int not null, [Hyperlink] nvarchar(max), [RegNumber] nvarchar(max), [RegDate] datetime, [Correspondent] nvarchar(max), [CorrespondentDepartment] nvarchar(max), [CorrespondentDate] datetime, [CorrespondentNumber] nvarchar(max), [SignedBy] nvarchar(max), [Subject] nvarchar(max), [Assignee] nvarchar(max), [CoAssignees] nvarchar(max), [Deadline] datetime, [PerformDate] nvarchar(max), [Status] nvarchar(max), [Result] nvarchar(max), [ReportSessionId] nvarchar(max) NOT NULL, [Overdue] int, [OutgoingDocID] int, [OutgoingDocHyperlink] nvarchar(max), [DocumentKind] nvarchar(max), [Addressee] nvarchar(max), [ActionItemText] nvarchar(max), [ReportingPeriod] nvarchar(max))
query.postgres: create table {0} ([recordId] int identity(1,1), [DocID] int not null, [Hyperlink] citext, [RegNumber] citext, [RegDate] datetime, [Correspondent] citext, [CorrespondentDepartment] citext, [CorrespondentDate] datetime, [CorrespondentNumber] citext, [SignedBy] citext, [Subject] citext, [Assignee] citext, [CoAssignees] citext, [Deadline] datetime, [PerformDate] citext, [Status] citext, [Result] citext, [ReportSessionId] citext NOT NULL, [Overdue] int, [OutgoingDocID] int, [OutgoingDocHyperlink] citext, [DocumentKind] citext, [Addressee] citext, [ActionItemText] citext, [ReportingPeriod] citext)

query.default: select * from RecordCustom_Reports_IncDocsReport temp where ReportSessionId = @ReportSessionId order by DocID
